data.actual_result: You can edit the message even without being able to send messages, which is inconsistent with Discord's permissions system
data.expected_result: Similar to how you cannot edit messages when you are missing Send Messages permissions, it is expected that you cannot edit messages when under Server Verification level restrictions as well
data.short_description: Can Edit Messages without being Verified
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message - Become unable to send messages because of server verification, either by having the server level raised, or leaving and rejoining a server on the highest (10 minute) level - Attempt to edit your previous message
